DOC.brief_summary: `` PrEPare Work '' two-stage randomize control pilot trial utilizes behavioral intervention optimize uptake adherence Pre-exposure Prophylaxis ( PrEP ) Male Sex Workers ( MSW ) .
DOC.brief_title: PrEPare Work Randomization Design : PrEPare Work
DOC.detailed_description: The `` PrEPare Work '' package include two behavioral intervention component : 1 . Peer-led strengths-based case management PrEP initiation , 2 . Counseling problem-solving PrEP adherence intervention address individualized barrier optimal use . Stage 1 : MSW equally randomize receive either peer-led strengths-based case management standard care referral PrEP clinic . Stage 2 : Those stage 1 initiate PrEP , regardless stage 1 randomization condition , equally randomize either `` PrEPare Work '' adherence intervention standard care comparison condition .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Biological male birth current male gender identity Exchanged sex money drug another man past 3 month Behavioral risk HIV infection ( Unprotected AnaI Intercourse least one HIV infect unknown serostatus partner precede 3 month ) HIV uninfected antibody test Able understand speak English ( consent counseling ) Mental competency provide voluntary informed consent Lives New England area Willing initiate PrEP Inability consent due psychiatric cognitive concern Active Hepatitis B infection ( i.e. , Hepatitis B core surface antigen positive ) Renal insufficiency ( i.e. , glomerular filtration rate > 50 mL/min ) History current medical condition would preclude take study drug Currently prescribe PrEP
